channel.title: 3rd Problem
channel.description:
Ok this is quite a big problem ok when i attack the npcs lets just say a Man (level-2) it has 7 hitpoints when i hit a 7 its bar is red but they dont die when the bars red i cannot melee them so i mage them everyspell i cast on them just hits 0's so baseicly u cannot kill npcs but u can knock them down to 0hp they just standd there not attacking back
i will be very greatfull if someone could help me out and show me the solution to this problem

item.title: 3rd Problem
item.dc:creator: @lov3_rs_money lov3_rs_money
item.description:
@lov3_rs_money wrote:

check in npc.cfg and see if they’ve got 0 hp, if they do change it

lov3_rs_money

Read full topic
